short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates grade average for Schul-Netz as well as other functions and quality of life improvements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides an overview of your current average across all grades in Schul-Netz, displaying both the raw and rounded averages - matching what you'll see in your end-of-semester report.

It also offers detailed insights into your grades, including:

› General statistics about your performance.
› Your highest and lowest grades.
› Subjects where you can easily improve. (Average falls between a 0.20–0.24 and 0.70–0.74)
› See the grades needed to reach 0.25 or 0.75 in these subjects.

Disclaimer: 
› I am in no way affiliated with Kanti Baden. This is a personal script created to simplify average calculations because frankly, it annoys me to calculate them every time.
› Currently, it works exclusively with the Kanti Baden website. If your school uses Schul-Netz and you'd like support added, feel free to reach out to me.

Contact
